1210990.name: Eternal Card Game - Starter Kit
1210990.description:
Get started in Eternal Card Game with this kit! It comes with a Forge ticket, 5 pre-constructed theme decks, a Premium “Ashara, Ruthless Assassin” Avatar, and 500 Gems to spend in game!

In Forge, players draft 25 cards to build a deck and then battle up to 7 opponents for increasing rewards. Cards you select in Forge are also added to your collection!

The 5 Theme Decks are ready to play and can be used in Gauntlet or Throne game modes! Each 75-card deck showcases a primary mechanic from the seventh set of Eternal, The Flame of Xulta, and comes with 3 Rare cards and 1 Legendary card each.

• Eloz’s Secrets: Curse your enemies into oblivion
• Nahid’s Followers: Sacrifice everything for victory
• Rujin’s Army: Arm your exalted heroes
• Sodi’s Convergence: Muster your forces for battle
• Geminon’s Fury: Wield fire and ice alike

The Premium Avatar can be equipped under the Profile section.

Welcome to Eternal!
1210990.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 希腊语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 简体中文, 土耳其语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
